text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Haaa-ha-ha-ha―!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I won, Trainer! 1800 meters, in a flash!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yes, it's all because I'm amazing!! I won because I'm amazing!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now they know that my speed is good enough for any race!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: So, Trainer, about the next race, the Satsuki Sho――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Eh, indeed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Of course, I'm amazing! So, the next Satsuki Sho――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Of course it is!! Speed is the very mark of a class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Taking advantage of the very same speed that won this Spring Stakes, the Satsuki Sho―
choice_data_list: I want to train you, more and more!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Eh!
choice_data_list: To undoubtedly make sure you win every single race!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: No matter what the race, undoubtedly…!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: By undoubtedly, in other words, you mean 100%. The same probability as the fact that I'm the class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: To sum it up… this means that if I enter a race, I'll 100% win it!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: If I train my speed more than I already do, will that be possible!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Understood!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'll work on my speed even more! The class president who must be a role model, must win!
choice_data_list: Then, next up, the Aoi Stakes!
Then, next up, the Aoi Stakes!

text_block_list.text: It's a lower grade, but a 1200 meter race that should be a steady winner.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yes!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Wait, the Aoi Stakes?
choice_data_list:
The best way to train your speed 
is through real combat!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now that you mention it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Understood! Let's work on my speed in real combat!!
Thus, our next target race was decided to be the Aoi Stakes!
